data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Breure, Abraham S. H., Avila, Valentin Mogollon (2016): Synopsis of Central Andean Orthalicoid land snails (Gastropoda, Stylommatophora), excluding Bulimulidae. ZooKeys 588: 1-199, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.588.7906, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.588.7906
